full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO BAM SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I THUGS DAM BSKANGS PA DANG, 'GAL RKYEN GYI 'TSUB LHONG SOGS ZHI BA LA MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PA, SROG CHAGS RGYU SKONGS DANG, @008A *, ,BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SBYAR YANG SNYIGS MAR SBYOR BA'I DBANG GIS MA MO MKHA' 'GRO 'KHRUGS PA'I 'TSUB LHONGS KYIS BSKYOD PA'I NAD GDON SHIN TU MANG BA DANG, LHAG PAR LO SNGA PHYIR NYE BSKOR DU NAD RIMS RIGS MI 'DRA BA MANG DU MCHED CING, MI SHIS PA'I LTAS MTSAN MA SNA TSOGS 'BYUNG BA, BSRUNG MA'I 'KHU LDOG  GI RNAM PA YIN PA DANG, BSKANGS BSHAGS MANG DU BTANG NA LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN RTOGS KYI RI MOR SHAR BA BZHIN, LAG LEN DU BSTAN SKABS, ^ BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE'I GSUNGS LA TSIG PHRAD CUNG ZAD BSGYUR CING, LAG LEN GSAL BAR BGYIS TE, DBEN GNAS BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU BLAG CHOG CHU 'BABS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG MI MTHUN NYER 'TSE THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING, 'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO DGYES PAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS 'GRUB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,'DI CHES GNYAN PAS, ,GANG THOD DU BYA MI RUNG GSUNG PAS SGOD MIN LA GSANG SHING SKABS SHES PAR BYA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
